@Border0464fred: Um, this woman did not pay the debt, and the one who keeps the photos leaked them out. The 'key', which not relative to the leaker and (as I assumed) maintained by someone who collect these personal info, gives you an access to a collection of these leak-outs. You can read more about `btsync` or `Resilio Sync`, a p2p syncing software.
